goals.goal1: I want to maintain and improve my physical health and well-being, with increased physical exercise.'
goals.goal2: I want to develop my social and communication skills to make friends and to participate in community activities, including volunteering or working
goals.goal3: I want to improve my daily living skills to live as safely and independently as possible in a house near my parents, now and in the future

conversation.question: What do you think has been the most enjoyable part of your boxing sessions so far?
conversation.answer: I really enjoyed the kicking involved

conversation.question: How have you noticed your physical health improving since starting boxing?
conversation.answer: A lot. I can box for longer now

conversation.question: Are there any specific goals or challenges you'd like to set for yourself in relation to boxing in the coming months?
conversation.answer: I want to get better at partner boxing

conversation.question: What did you enjoy most about playing zumba? How did it make you feel?
conversation.answer: I like zumba a lot, it makes me happy

conversation.question: How do you think your experience with zumba could be applied to making friends or participating in community activities?
conversation.answer: It is a group activity so I meet people

conversation.question: Are there any skills or strategies you used while playing zumba that you would like to use in other areas of your life?
What did you learn about cooking while making your favourite meal?
conversation.answer: my favourite part about cooking is that I get to eat the food after

conversation.question: How do you think cooking has helped you with taking care of yourself?
conversation.answer: I know what goes into my food

conversation.question: What would you like to achieve in the next few weeks with your cooking skills?
conversation.answer: I want to make spaghetti bolognese
